extendedInfo.description: If you are Pink's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Pink's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Pink's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Pink's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :) -------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics -------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Can't Take Me Home - Missundaztood - Try This - I'm Not Dead - Funhouse - The Truth About Love -------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - 18 Wheeler - Are We All We Are - Ave Mary A - Bad Bad Day - Bad Influence - Beam Me Up - Blow Me (One Last Kiss) - Boring - Bridge Of Light - Can't Take Me Home - Catch Me While I'm Sleeping - Catch-22 - Centerfold - Chaos & Piss - Conversations With My 13 Year Old Self - Could've Had Everything - Crash & Burn - Crystal Ball - 'Cuz I Can - Dear Diary - Dear Mr. President - Delirium - Disconnected - Do What You Do - Don't Let Me Get Me - Eventually - Family Portrait - Feel Good Time - Fingers - Free - Fuckin' Perfect - Funhouse - Get The Party Started - Get The Party Started (Sweat Dreams Remix) - Glitter In The Air - God Is A DJ - Gone To California - Good Old Days - Heartbreak Down - Heartbreaker - Hell Wit Ya - Here Comes The Weekend - Hiccup - Hooker - How Come You're Not Here - Humble Neighborhoods - I Can't Help It - I Don't Believe You - I Got Money Now - I Have Seen The Rain - I'm Not Dead - Is It Love - Is This Thing On? - It's All Your Fault - Just Give Me A Reason - Just Like A Pill - Last To Know - Leave Me Alone (I'm Lonely) - Let Me Let You Know - Lonely Girl - Long Way To Happy - Love Is Such A Crazy Thing - Love Song - Mean - Misery - Missundaztood - Most Girls - My Signature Move - My Vietnam - Nobody Knows - Numb - Oh My God - One Foot Wrong - Please Don't Leave Me - Private Show - Push You Away - Raise Your Glass - Respect - Run - Runaway - Save My Life - Slut Like You - So What - Sober - Split Personality - Stop Falling - Stupid Girls - The Great Escape - The King Is Dead But The Queen Is Alive - The One That Got Away - The Truth About Love - There You Go - This Is How It Goes Down - Timebomb - Tonight's The Night - Trouble - True Love - Try - Try Too Hard - U + Ur Hand - Unwind - Waiting For Love - Walk Away - Walk Of Shame - Whataya Want From Me - When We're Through - Where Did The Beat Go? - Who Knew - Why Did I Ever Like You - Words - You Make Me Sick

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I love P!nk & this app helps me manage her song lyrics right at my fingertips.
reviews.author: Nicole G.
